"use client" import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { X } from "lucide-react" const AddPetModal = ({ onClose, onPetAdded }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", species: "", breed: "", birth_date: "", gender: "", weight: "", color: "", }) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState("") const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) setError("") // 1. Get the access token from localStorage const accessToken = localStorage.getItem("token"); // 2. Handle cases where the access token is missing if (!accessToken) { setError("ไม่พบข้อมูลการเข้าสู่ระบบ กรุณาเข้าสู่ระบบอีกครั้ง"); setLoading(false); return; } try { const response = await axios.post("/api/pets", formData, { // 3. Add the Authorization header to the request headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${accessToken}`, }, }) onPetAdded(response.data) onClose() // Close the modal on success } catch (error) { setError(error.response?.data?.error || "เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการเพิ่มสัตว์เลี้ยง") } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (

เพิ่มสัตว์เลี้ยงใหม่

{error &&
{error}
}
) } export default AddPetModal
